str2: To raise, lift up, take away, remove.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
A branch, shoot, twig. From klao; a limb or shoot.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

str2: To carry, bear, bring; I conduct, lead; perhaps: I make publicly known. A primary verb.
Probably from the base of harpazo; fruit, literally or figuratively.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

str2: To cleanse, purify, prune. From katharos; to cleanse, i.e. to prune; figuratively, to expiate.
